column2: "Mebɛma m’enyiwa do akyerɛ mbepɔw no: Henfa na mo mboa fi bɛba?"

column3: Ɔno a ɔyɛɛ sor na asaase no."

column2: "Ɔremma kwan ma w’anan mpatser: Nyia ɔkora wo do no ronntɔ nkom."

column3: nyia ɔkora Israel do no Ɔronntɔ nkom eso ɔrennda."

column2: "EWURADZE nye nyia ɔkora wo do: EWURADZE nye wo nwin wɔ w’abanyimfa."

column3: Nkyii so bosoom rinnsi wo do adzesaa."

column2: "EWURADZE bɔkora wo do efi mbusu nyinara mu; Ɔbɔkora wo kra do."
"EWURADZE bɔkora w’edzifir na wo fieba do
column3: Ofitsi aber yi dze kesi daapem."
